response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. This item holds significant worth to us, but we're confident it will be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Given its importance to us, we're offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. We believe this is a fair compromise that reflects both the value we place on the product and the benefit it will bring to you. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
